Introduction

Wonsik is a South Korean singer under MyDoll Entertainment. He is part of the male duo TMC, which will debut in 2023. He was also a member of Apeace and its sub-unit JADE5, a boy group that debuted in 2012 with the mini album "We Are The One".

He joined the survival show G-EGG in 2020, but did not make it to the final.

He moved to MyDoll Entertainment in October 2022 and formed TMC with Seunghyuk.

On May 10, 2024, Wonsik was announced as a member of the upcoming co-ed group ToTh6y.
